modName: Skyrim Character Customizations - Play as Crixus
summary: Play as Crixus in Skyrim the undefeated Gaul
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-h-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-ash3/543407_465580306882236_1227006292_n.jpg[/img]

[b][heading]Crixus has been unleashed as a custom character for Elder Scrolls Skyrim hope you enjoy playing as this legendary warrior from the T.V series Spartacus. He has been made from the upcoming Spartacus - War of The Damned series so sorry if he doesn\'t have the short hair.
[/heading][/b]

[youtube]bzdLLQSnAQ4[/youtube]

[b]Mods Used[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]

[b]Head over to my Youtube Channel for more characters[/b]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/user/DeadStatix]Youtube Channel[/url]

[/center]
author: DeadStatix
